title: Bariatric surgery beats GLP-1s for type 2 diabetes across income levels, study says
description: Across all income levels, bariatric surgery resulted in better diabetes control than GLP-1s or similar medications, a study found.
content: Across all income levels, bariatric surgery resulted in better diabetes control than GLP-1s or similar medications, a study found.
